title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 58.7 - Term of approval of course work or training
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 58.7 - Term of approval of course work or training

State Regulations
(a) Course work or training shall be approved
for a period of six years, except that the approved status of such course work
or training may be terminated during this term by the department in accordance
with section
58.8
of this Part. (b) At the expiration of said term, a
provider may reapply to the department for approval of course work or training
following the requirements of section
58.6
of this Part, including
payment of the required fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
58.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
